text: Alex Perry (born 4 March 1998) is an English footballer who plays as a midfielder for Wigan Athletic. ==Career== Perry came through Bolton's academy and made his debut for the team on 30 August 2016 when he started in a 2-0 home loss against Everton U-23s in the Football League Trophy Group Stage.
